LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.label: Arachne Nutrient Supply Tower
LanguageData.ARA_NutrientNetworkTower.description: A central nutrient supply facility. It can automatically refuel linked buildings that require nutrients. It itself needs to be manually filled with large amounts of biomass.
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.label: Arachne's Crystal Lair
LanguageData.ARANutrientDispenser.description: A lair that produces Arachne nectar, which is produced by breaking down insect honey to produce edible nectar. This food processed in the nest can help the insect swarm resist the influence of cold-blooded animals, and its soft and chewy texture makes it enjoyable for non-zerg colonists.
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.label: Arachne Weaver Seat
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.description: The living structure formed with the Arachne Weaver Species as the core is a necessary building to advance the advanced research of the insect swarm. This building cannot be constructed and can only be obtained by transforming the Arachneweaver species.
LanguageData.ARA_MorphableResearchBench.comps.CompPro: Make the weaving domain species leave the weaving seat and resume its moving state.
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.label: Biomass brewing tank
LanguageData.ARA_JellyVat.description: An Arachne living tissue can make full use of the dissolving ability of living giant bacteria to secrete nutritious Arachne honey by digesting biomass. Arachne honey will spread throughout the room, forming honey pools, and the biomass brewing pit will periodically mark these flowing nectars, ordering other bugs to collect them.
LanguageData.ARA_InsectJelly_Terrain.label: Arachne Honey
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.label: bone flower
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Productor.description: An Arachne zerg living tissue can make full use of the catalytic ability of living giant bacteria to convert nearby corpses into bone pillars and order other swarm members to dismantle them to obtain chitin.
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Column.label: bone column
LanguageData.ARA_Carapace_Column.description: Arachne's bone flower catalyzes the conversion of corpses into pillars, which can be dismantled by the swarm to obtain chitin.
